snippet.title: Glo - Indie Game Steam - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Coming October 23rd
Wishlist Now http://store.steampowered.com/app/711550/Glo/

What happens in a game where most of it is hidden?

Glo is a puzzle platformer where the majority of the world is hidden. Using blind faith, glowing projectiles and memory use your skill to escape the darkness. Provoked by writing on the wall the story unravels as the mystery of the environment is revealed.

Story

Tormented by the unknown environment and messages on the wall that give the feeling of being watched, Glo finds himself in a strange world where everything is covered in darkness.

Using whatever light he can find and blind faith, Glo must try to find his way through the darkness to unravel the mystery and escape this nightmare.

Developed by www.chronikspartan.com

🔔 Subscribe for more Gaming News and Retro Game Content: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC-ia9v5dcB38QN8e26e0heA?sub_confirmation=1

👍 Share this video with a friend:
https://youtu.be/q0Pajhe5Clg

▶️ Watch next – https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=22SbQ-KGLtA

▶️ Recommended Playlist – https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLYnWamr1q89uV5QrFNIfhQfwb1RGRB3mS

✅ Let’s connect:

Instagram – https://www.instagram.com/chronikspartan/
Twitter – https://twitter.com/Chronik_Spartan
Discord – https://discord.gg/XPU6x5R

❤️ If you want to support even further you can join the community on Patreon  - https://patreon.com/chronikspartan

🎮 Indie Games by Chronik Spartan:

GLO – https://store.steampowered.com/app/711550/Glo/
Gym Empire – https://store.steampowered.com/app/756300/Gym_Empire/

🎥 Filming Equipment:

SAMTIAN LED Video Light  Amazon UK: https://amzn.to/2EQRXkF
SAMTIAN LED Video Light  Amazon US: https://amzn.to/2H1qsqZ

PEMOTech 51" Phone Tripod: https://amzn.to/2EPD0zw

Clip on Microphone 3.5mm Amazon UK: https://amzn.to/2ESGHo9
Clip on Microphone 3.5mm Amazon US: https://amzn.to/2HhQF3V

As an Amazon Associate I earn from qualifying purchases.

Product prices and availability are accurate as of the date/time indicated and are subject to change. Any price and availability information displayed on Amazon.com and Amazon.co.uk at the time of purchase will apply to the purchase of this product. 

🎮 For more gaming and indie development checkout:
www.chronikspartan.com

#indiegame #platformer #abstract
